p: Pinoresinol di- O-β- d-glucoside was used as the only standard in many analytical methods for the quantification of pinoresinol diglucosides (e.g., [ 110]). Furthermore, protocols for the quantification of total pinoresinol relying on enzymatic deglucosylation that were validated only with pinoresinol di- O-β- d-glucoside (e.g., [ 111]) might fail with other pinoresinol diglucoside isomers.
